name: Rap Videos Quiz | Music Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Xzibit 'X'. Name one of the two rap artist that appear in the video.
questions.correct: Dr Dre & Snoop Dogg & Snoop Doggy Dogg & Dr. Dre
questions.explanation: Dr Dre & Snoop Dogg & Snoop Doggy Dogg & Dr. Dre

questions.text: Xzibit 'X'. When the time first appears on the video, What time is it?
Dr Dre and Eminem 'Forgot About DRE'. What is the title of the article when you first see Eminem?
Dr Dre and Eminem 'Forgot About DRE'. What colour is the car that Em and Dre drive up to old lady's house in?
Eminem 'STAN' What is Stans' FULL name?
questions.explanation:
Stanley Mitchell & stanley mitchell.

	You see on the grave stone towards the end of the clip.

questions.text: Eminem 'STAN'. What is the postcode or zipcode on the envelope?
questions.explanation:
90404.

	You have to be quick to see this one.

questions.text: Ice Cube, Dr Dre and MC Ren 'Hello'. What is on Ice Cube's beanie?
Ice Cube, Dr Dre and MC Ren 'Hello'. How many Female Cops are there?
2pac and Tha Outlawz 'Baby Don't Cry'. What colour bridge are tha outlawz standing on towards the end of the clip?
2pac and Tha Outlawz 'Baby Don't Cry'. What 2pac Video do they take scenes from?
questions.explanation:
Keep ya head up.

	Now this was an easy one.
